00027 int Matrice_Sym::get_est_definie() const
00028 {
00029   return est_definie_;
00030 }

00032 void Matrice_Sym::set_est_definie(int val)

00036 
00037 void Matrice_Sym::unsymmetrize_stencil( const int& nb_lines,
00038                                         const IntTab& symmetric_stencil,
00039                                         IntTab&       stencil ) const
00040 {
00041 
00042   ArrOfInt offsets( nb_lines + 1 );
00043   offsets[ 0 ] = 0;
00044 
00045   const int symmetric_stencil_size = symmetric_stencil.dimension( 0 );
00046   for ( int k=0; k<symmetric_stencil_size; ++k )
00047     {
00048       const int line   = symmetric_stencil( k, 0 );
00049       const int column = symmetric_stencil( k, 1 );
00050       offsets[ line   + 1 ] += 1;
00051       offsets[ column + 1 ] += ( line == column ) ? 0 : 1 ;
00052     }
00053 
00054   for ( int i=0; i<nb_lines; ++i )
00055     {
00056       offsets[ i + 1 ] += offsets[ i ];
00057     }
00058 
00059   const int stencil_size = offsets[ nb_lines ];
00060   stencil.resize( stencil_size, 2 );
00061 
00062   stencil = -1;
00063 
00064   int index;
00065   for ( int k=0; k<symmetric_stencil_size; ++k )
00066     {
00067       const int line   = symmetric_stencil( k, 0 );
00068       const int column = symmetric_stencil( k, 1 );
00069 
00070 
00071       index = offsets[ line ];
00072 
00073       assert( stencil( index, 0 ) < 0 );
00074       assert( stencil( index, 1 ) < 0 );
00075       assert( index < offsets[ line + 1 ] );
00076 
00077       stencil( index, 0 ) = line;
00078       stencil( index, 1 ) = column;
00079 
00080       offsets[ line ] += 1;
00081 
00082       if ( line != column )
00083         {
00084           index = offsets[ column ];
00085 
00086           assert( stencil( index, 0 ) < 0 );
00087           assert( stencil( index, 1 ) < 0 );
00088           assert( index < offsets[ column + 1 ] );
00089 
00090           stencil( index, 0 ) = column;
00091           stencil( index, 1 ) = line;
00092 
00093           offsets[ column ] += 1;
00094         }
00095     }
00096 }
00097 
00098 void Matrice_Sym::unsymmetrize_stencil_and_coefficients( const int&      nb_lines,
00099                                                          const IntTab&      symmetric_stencil,
00100                                                          const ArrOfDouble& symmetric_coefficients,
00101                                                          IntTab&            stencil,
00102                                                          ArrOfDouble&       coefficients ) const
00103 {
00104   ArrOfInt offsets( nb_lines + 1 );
00105   offsets[ 0 ] = 0;
00106 
00107   const int symmetric_stencil_size = symmetric_stencil.dimension( 0 );
00108   assert( symmetric_stencil_size == symmetric_coefficients.size_array( ) );
00109   for ( int k=0; k<symmetric_stencil_size; ++k )
00110     {
00111       const int line   = symmetric_stencil( k, 0 );
00112       const int column = symmetric_stencil( k, 1 );
00113       offsets[ line   + 1 ] += 1;
00114       offsets[ column + 1 ] += ( line == column ) ? 0 : 1 ;
00115     }
00116 
00117   for ( int i=0; i<nb_lines; ++i )
00118     {
00119       offsets[ i + 1 ] += offsets[ i ];
00120     }
00121 
00122   const int stencil_size = offsets[ nb_lines ];
00123   stencil.resize( stencil_size, 2 );
00124   coefficients.resize_array( stencil_size );
00125 
00126   stencil = -1;
00127 
00128   int index;
00129   for ( int k=0; k<symmetric_stencil_size; ++k )
00130     {
00131       const int line        = symmetric_stencil( k, 0 );
00132       const int column      = symmetric_stencil( k, 1 );
00133       const double coefficient = symmetric_coefficients[ k ];
00134 
00135       index = offsets[ line ];
00136 
00137       assert( stencil( index, 0 ) < 0 );
00138       assert( stencil( index, 1 ) < 0 );
00139       assert( index < offsets[ line + 1 ] );
00140 
00141       stencil( index, 0 )   = line;
00142       stencil( index, 1 )   = column;
00143       coefficients[ index ] = coefficient;
00144 
00145       offsets[ line ] += 1;
00146 
00147       if ( line != column )
00148         {
00149           index = offsets[ column ];
00150 
00151           assert( stencil( index, 0 ) < 0 );
00152           assert( stencil( index, 1 ) < 0 );
00153           assert( index < offsets[ column + 1 ] );
00154 
00155           stencil( index, 0 )   = column;
00156           stencil( index, 1 )   = line;
00157           coefficients[ index ] = coefficient;
00158 
00159           offsets[ column ] += 1;
00160         }
00161     }
00162 }
